thread.title: Attempted Jerusalem knife attack, assailant shot: Police - Region - World
thread.title_full: Attempted Jerusalem knife attack, assailant shot: Police - Region - World - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Attempted Jerusalem knife attack, assailant shot: Police - Region - World
text:
Related Picture of the day: Palestinian woman slingshots Israeli occupation soldiers Israel to set-up checkpoints in East Jerusalem; Palestinian general strikes in Bethlehem, Sakhneen Outbreak of violence between Palestinians and Israelis Netanyahu says will use 'all means' to end Palestinian violence Israeli police said a "terrorist" attempted to stab a security guard at an entrance to Jerusalem's Old City on Wednesday but was shot before harming anyone, the latest in a wave of such incidents.
"A terrorist who ran with a knife at a guard who was escorting a family at the Damascus Gate plaza was neutralised by police," a statement said, without specifying if the attacker was wounded or killed.
